meanings.def: a person who works in an office, working for another person, dealing with mail and phone calls, keeping records, arranging meetings with people, etc.
examples: Please contact my secretary to make an appointment.
secretary to somebody/something He is secretary to the board of governors.

meanings.def: an official of a club, society, etc. who deals with mail, keeping records and making business arrangements
examples: She served as club secretary for 25 years.
The union's branch secretary said he hoped a solution would be found.
secretary to somebody/something secretary to the Jockey Club

meanings.def: (in the UK) the head of an important government department
the head of a government department, chosen by the president
examples: She was deputy secretary of agriculture in the first Obama administration.

meanings.def: an assistant of a government minister, an ambassador, etc.
examples: Ms Watson is a former parliamentary secretary to the Minister of Education.
